subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: After an absence of 33 years because of separatist violence, the Basque region is set to be host to Tour of Spain races this month, and the region's passionate cycling fans could not be happier.
snippet: After an absence of 33 years because of separatist violence, the Basque region is set to be host to Tour of Spain races this month, and the region's passionate cycling fans could not be happier.
